Curhat Nelson Semedo yang Jadi Korban Masalah Bek Kiri Barcelona
05 Nov 2019, 11:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Nelson Semedo harus berjuang ekstra untuk membuktikan kemampuannya dalam tim inti Barcelona. Pasalnya, Semedo yang seharusnya bermain sebagai bek kanan justru terpaksa mengisi pos bek kiri pada beberapa pertandingan.
Situasi bek kiri Barcelona ini memang aneh dan menimbulkan pertanyaan besar. Jordi Alba tetap jadi pilihan utama, tapi yang aneh adalah keputusan Ernesto Valverde ketika Alba terpaksa absen karena cedera atau akumulasi.
Alih-alih menurunkan Junior Firpo, bek kiri yang seharusnya jadi pelapis Alba, Valverde justru menurunkan Nelson Semedo. Keputusan ini jelas berisiko, Semedo sejatinya lebih nyaman bermain di kanan.
Perubahan posisi dari kanan ke kiri, atau sebaliknya, jauh lebih sulit daripada yang terlihat. Mengapa demikian? Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!

Confide Nelson Semedo who is a victim of the Barcelona Left Back problem
05 Nov 2019, 11:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Nelson Semedo has to fight extra to prove his ability in the Barcelona first team. The reason, Semedo who should play as a right-back would be forced to fill the left-back post in several matches.
The situation of the Barcelona left back is indeed strange and raises big questions. Jordi Alba remains the first choice, but what is strange is Ernesto Valverde's decision when Alba was forced to miss because of injury or accumulation.
Instead of lowering Junior Firpo, the left back who was supposed to be Alba's coating, Valverde actually lowered Nelson Semedo. This decision is clearly risky, Semedo actually more comfortable playing on the right.
Changing position from right to left, or vice versa, is much more difficult than it looks. Why is that? Read below, Bolaneters!
